channel.title: Mac OS Compatibility
channel.description:
Hey folks, haven't been here in ages so I'm sorry if this is a known thing, however, I tried looking it up to no avail.
I'm having trouble recognizing any of my 2 boards (v1.0 and 1.1) on Big Sur, Axoloti v1.0.12. I'm getting a "No available USB device found with matching PID/VID" error. So I'm wondering if Axoloti is even compatible with Mac past Mojave. Few threads regarding MacOS compatibility I found are from before 2019 and search yields nothing about Big Sur in particular.
Would it be an option for me to try running Axo in a VM? If yes, what MacOS/Linux version would be the best for my case? (FWIW I'm on a 2018 15" MBP.)
Thanks a lot in advance!

item.title: Mac OS Compatibility
item.dc:creator: @bacha
item.description:
@bacha wrote:

Should've searched by the error first, I would've discovered the issue is the actual USB cable.

Can't seem to be able to delete this post, mods please do so. Thanks!

Read full topic
